participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, with a strong sense of duty and a passion for the arts.
participant_1.background: I don't care what color my hair is as long as I can keep acting. I am saving up to buy a new camera. I've learned to live without my dad. I play music in my spare time. I never told my parents about my deployment, but I would tell my friends all about it if I was famous.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and determined, with a love for learning and a unique perspective on life.
participant_2.background: I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair. I do my laundry every week, except for the Renaissance Faire outfit. I'm often late for class. I grew up homeschooled. I am colour blind.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I'm doing great, thank you! I'm excited to be chatting with you today.
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends.
That's great! I'm sure we'll get along well. I'm in the military, and I love to play music in my spare time.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm homeschooled, and I love to wear comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
That's really cool! I've never been homeschooled before, but I've heard it can be a great experience.
It can be, but it can also be difficult. I'm glad that I have the opportunity to do it, though.
That's great! What's your favorite thing about being homeschooled?
I love being able to learn at my own pace, and I love that I have more time to explore my interests.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying it. What are some of your interests?
I love to read, write, and play music. I'm also interested in history and science.
That's really cool! I love to read and play music too. I'm not as interested in history and science, but I think they're both really important.
I agree! I think it's important to be well-rounded and to have a variety of interests.
I agree! I think that's what makes life so much fun.
Me too! I'm glad we agree on that.
